vibesExplanation:
The primary vibe assigned to this workout is 'The Zen Flow' with a score of 0.8 due to the emphasis on slow-paced, breath-centered movement found in the phrases 'slow flow yoga,' 'vinyasa flow,' and 'yummy intermediate yoga.' The focus on flexibility and 'feel good flow' suggests a steady, meditative approach.

The vibe 'The Reboot Workout' is also applicable with a score of 0.6, as the video emphasizes 'deep stretch' and 'full body stretch,' which align with a refreshing and restorative theme indicated by comments reflecting a rejuvenating experience.

Lastly, 'The Groove Session' with a score of 0.4 is included due to the use of 'flow' in the title and description, suggesting a fluid and enjoyable movement experience contributed to by the seamless transition of poses as indicated by comments expressing a joyful experience.

Overall, highly suitable for an introspective and grounding practice, with an emphasis on deep, fluid stretches and a relaxing yet engaging format.
